description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Command your TOY SOLDIERS in epic, action-packed battles.  Position your defenses and take direct control of your artillery to bomb the enemy positions, pilot your bi-plane against the enemy trench, or maneuver your tanks across No-Man’s Land… and lead your TOY SOLDIERS to victory!  Dive into 2-player head-to-head combat, local and on Xbox LIVE.
shortDescription: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Command your TOY SOLDIERS in epic, action-packed battles.  Position your defenses and take direct control of your artillery to bomb the enemy positions, pilot your bi-plane against the enemy trench, or maneuver your tanks across No-Man’s Land… and lead your TOY SOLDIERS to victory!  Dive into 2-player head-to-head combat, local and on Xbox LIVE.
title: Toy Soldiers
